author: ate
msg: Remove maven-plugin goals for building the "old" installer2, which I'm gonna remove as well shortly.
The new installer project is just a simple maven project, no need for extra plugin goals

author: ate
msg: - lots of fixes, especially to get the installer working properly on Windows.
- added ant-installer provided button icons and removed no longer used images.
- remove xerces from the list of libraries to be embedded in the installer as it isn't needed anymore (reducing the installer size with almost 1Mb ;)
